tossup_question: -   –  A continuous function f has domain the closed interval from 1 to 25 and range the closed interval from 3 to 30. If f prime of x is less than 0 for all x in the closed interval from 1 to 25, what is f(25)?
bonus_question: -   –  The two legs of a right triangle have lengths of 6 and 2 times the square root of 3. How long is the altitude to the hypotenuse?
